start.text: Only weak-willed punks burn away before things even begin.
You know this isn't a silly game, yeah?
Mind where you point those guns at.
Let's give it our best shot. Work together.
This ship's a bit weaker than my previous ones, but I got no problem handling it.

start_boss.text: Pluck up. We're molded by the hardships and discipline of the past.
Shouldn't let your strength get to your head. You'll leave your crew wide open.

retreat.text: Retreating. Better to live to fight another day.
It's not gonna end like this. Retreating.

out_of_missiles.text: That's the last of our missiles.
That's all our ammo. Better hope we used it well.

engaged.text: Everyone ready? Let's beat them into submission.
The most important thing is to figure out what they'll try next and keep up with it.

need_help.text: Not looking very good. Stay frosty.
We need a hand with these ones.

pursuing.text: Careless and unfocused orders are a leading cause of death.
Thought you could get us? Not a chance.
Shoulda acted smart if you knew your crew was lacking.

running.text: We're in over our heads. Need to regroup.
Upsetting... But I have to pull back.

hull_90.text: Stay frosty. We've got a bit of damage.
They've got some hits in on us.
Hull's exposed in some spots. Careful.
Stay calm. Can't falter just because we lost a little armor.

hull_50.text: Heavy fire incoming. Keep your cool.
Damn it, a lot of the hull's exposed.
Things aren't looking good, but we can't stop here.

hull_30.text: Let's take em' down, but not before we've tempered our anger.

overload.text: We can't let ourselves falter. Get the systems back up, quickly.

death.text: I was a fool... I wasn't such a coward before.
It's upsetting... But I'll have to accept it.
Damn it, I wasn't hoping to retire this way...

victory.text: We got this over with smoothly. Good work, everyone.
Performance, experience, and results. Our side completely overwhelmed theirs.

victory_boss.text: Even though we've won, keep in mind we shouldn't take each other's sacrifices for granted.
